name: Forest Hunt (shikariix)
description:
Forest Hunt was developed as part of a set of games meant to teach kids about LGBT+ identities. The game focuses on the journey of self discovery and is supposed to teach kids that there is no one 'right way' to get to the end goal. It is okay to be confused sometimes.

The game is in Dutch, as it was developed for schools in the Netherlands.

All artwork was made by the wonderful Auroranekai. More of her work can be found on ArtStation.
